page.title: 11SCHOOL AND RELIGION
page.content: Ours is a very mixed school. We have white children, most of them born in West Drayton and Asians who were also born in this country. This means that we have many religious beliefs in the school. When we asked the children which church they belonged to we found that we had Catholic, Church of England, Baptist, Methodist, Sikhs, Muslims, Hindi and many who did not know. This mixture gives us some very interesting assemblies because we do not always have stories from the Christian Bible. We celebrated the {Festival of Light}and learned a lot about the Indian Gods. We find that all the religions teach the same kind of thing, to be kind and caring to each other. It is only the ceremonies that are so very different.
